AT.name: Lone Survivor: The Director's Cut
AT.description: In diesem psychologischen Überlebensabenteuer muss der maskierte Protagonist aus einer von Krankheit verseuchten Stadt fliehen. Koste es, was es wolle. Vollkommen erschöpft beginnt er sich zu fragen, was real ist und was nicht. Lone Survivor: The Director's Cut ist eine neue Art von Abenteuerspiel, das es dir überlässt, wie du überleben willst. Schleiche unerkannt durch das Spiel oder schieße alles über den Haufen. Iss und schlafe genug oder nimm Drogen, um fit zu bleiben. Suche nach Überlebenden oder versuche es auf eigene Faust. Bleibe bei Sinnen oder versinke im Wahnsinn. In Lone Survivor sind deine Entscheidungen wirklich ausschlaggebend. Diese erweiterte Ausgabe von Jasper Byrnes Meisterwerk setzt die unter die Haut gehende Geschichte von Lone Survior fort: zahlreiche kleine Details, neue Orte, Dialoge, Side-Quests und zuzubereitende Gegenstände und sogar zwei vollkommen neue Enden. Lone Survivor: The Director's Cut ist die ultimative Version dieses viel bejubelten Spiels.

AU.name: Lone Survivor: The Director's Cut
AU.description: In this psychological survival adventure, the masked protagonist must escape from a city ravaged by disease, by any means necessary. Starving and exhausted, he has begun to question how much of what he sees is even real. Lone Survivor: The Director's Cut is a new kind of adventure where the choice of how to survive is up to you. Sneak through without firing a single shot, or kill everything in your path. Eat and sleep well, or resort to drugs to keep going. Search for survivors, or try to escape the city alone. Look after your mental health, or descend into madness. Lone Survivor is a game where your choices genuinely matter. This extended edition of Jasper Byrne's horror masterpiece expands Lone Survivor's deep story with hundreds of tiny new details, more locations, more dialogue, more side quests, more craftable items, and even two completely new endings. Lone Survivor: The Director's Cut really is the ultimate version of this acclaimed game.

Lone Survivor: The Director's Cut really is the ultimate version of this acclaimed game.

BE.name: Lone Survivor: The Director's Cut
BE.description: Dans cette aventure 'survival' psychologique, le protagoniste masqué doit s'échapper coûte que coûte d'une ville ravagée par la maladie. Affamé et à bout de forces, il commence à se demander si tout ce qu'il voit est bien réel... Lone Survivor: The Director's Cut est une nouvelle formule d'aventure où vous choisissez comment survivre. Avancez sans tirer un seul coup de feu ou tuez tout ce qui bouge. Mangez et dormez ou ingurgitez des médicaments pour repousser vos limites. Recherchez des survivants ou sauvez égoïstement votre peau. Surveillez votre santé mentale ou sombrez dans la folie. Lone Survivor oblige à faire des choix qui comptent. Cette version longue du chef-d'œuvre de Jasper Byrne approfondit l'histoire avec des centaines de détails inédits, de nouveaux lieux, dialogues, quêtes secondaires, objets à fabriquer, et même deux fins de plus. Lone Survivor: The Director's Cut est la version ultime de ce jeu universellement reconnu.

ES.name: Lone Survivor: The Director's Cut
ES.description: En esta aventura psicológica de supervivencia, el protagonista enmascarado tiene que escapar de una ciudad devastada por una enfermedad, a toda costa. Muerto de hambre y agotado, empieza a preguntarse si lo que ve es real. Lone Survivor: The Director's Cut es un nuevo tipo de aventura donde la elección de cómo sobrevivir depende de ti: avanza sigilosamente sin un solo tiro o destruye todo lo que encuentres come y duerme bien o recurre a las drogas para seguir el ritmo busca a supervivientes o intenta escapar a solas preocúpate de tu salud mental o lánzate a la locura. Lone Survivor es un juego donde tus elecciones tienen consecuencias. La edición extendida de la obra de terror de Jasper Byrne amplía la profunda historia de Lone Survivor con cientos de detalles, más escenarios, más diálogos, más misiones secundarias, más objetos fabricables e incluso dos finales completamente nuevos. Lone Survivor: The Director's Cut es realmente la versión definitiva de este juego.

IT.name: Lone Survivor: The Director's Cut
IT.description: Un'avventura al confine fra sopravvivenza e sanità mentale. Un protagonista celato dietro a una mascherina, in una città sconfitta dalla malattia. È costretto a fuggire, a ogni costo, sfiancato da fame e fatica, incerto su quanto ci possa essere di vero in ciò che vede. Lone Survivor: The Director's Cut è un'avventura dove spetta a te decidere come sopravvivere: raggira tutti senza sparare un colpo, o fatti strada un cadavere alla volta mangia e dormi, oppure tira avanti a forza di droghe cerca i sopravvissuti o scappa da solo resta sano di mente o sprofonda nell'oblio della follia. Lone Survivor è un gioco dove le tue scelte hanno vere ripercussioni. Questa rivisitazione del capolavoro horror di Jasper Byrne ne sviluppa la storia, introducendo centinaia di inedite sfaccettature: luoghi, dialoghi, missioni secondarie e oggetti assemblabili aggiuntivi, e due finali completamente nuovi. Lone Survivor: The Director's Cut è la versione definitiva di questo acclamato gioco.

NL.name: Lone Survivor: The Director's Cut
NL.description: In dit psychologische survivalavontuur moet de gemaskerde held op elke mogelijke manier uit een stad ontsnappen die verteerd wordt door ziekte. Hongerig en uitgeput begint hij zich af te vragen wat nou precies echt is en wat niet. Lone Survivor: The Director's Cut is een nieuw soort avontuur waarin jij bepaalt hoe je overleeft. Speel zonder een schot te lossen of vermoord alles dat op je pad komt. Eet en slaap goed, of gebruik drugs om op de been te blijven. Zoek naar overlevenden of ontsnap in je eentje. Hou je geestelijke gezondheid in de gaten, of word krankzinnig. Lone Survivor is een spel waarin je keuzes echt een verschil uitmaken. Deze uitgebreide versie van Jasper Byrne's angstaanjagende meesterwerk borduurt verder op Lone Survivor's duistere verhaal met honderden nieuwe details, meer locaties, meer dialogen, meer missies, meer voorwerpen om te maken en zelfs twee compleet nieuwe aflopen. Lone Survivor: The Director's Cut is echt de ultieme versie van deze bewierookte game.

NZ.name: Lone Survivor: The Director's Cut
NZ.description: In this psychological survival adventure, the masked protagonist must escape from a city ravaged by disease, by any means necessary. Starving and exhausted, he has begun to question how much of what he sees is even real. Lone Survivor: The Director's Cut is a new kind of adventure where the choice of how to survive is up to you. Lone Survivor: The Director's Cut really is the ultimate version of this acclaimed game.

PT.name: Lone Survivor: The Director's Cut
PT.description: Nesta aventura psicológica de sobrevivência, o protagonista mascarado deve escapar de uma cidade assolada pela doença. Esfomeado e exausto, ele começa questionar-se sobre se o que vê será real. Lone Survivor: The Director's Cut é um novo tipo de aventura, onde a escolha de como sobrevives está nas tuas mãos. Esgueira-te sorrateiramente sem disparar um único tiro, ou mata tudo no teu caminho. Come e dorme bem, ou recorre às drogas para continuar. Procura sobreviventes ou tenta escapar da cidade sozinho. Cuida da tua saúde mental, ou cai na loucura. Lone Survivor é um jogo no qual as tuas escolhas são realmente importantes. Esta edição aumentada da obra-prima de terror de Jasper Byrne expande a história complexa do Lone Survivor com centenas de novos detalhes minúsculos, mais locais, mais diálogos, mais missões secundárias, mais objetos para fabricar e até dois fins completamente novos. Lone Survivor: The Director's Cut é realmente a maior versão deste jogo aclamado pela crítica.

RU.name: Lone Survivor: The Director's Cut
RU.description: В этой психологической игре на выживание главному герою в маске необходимо выбраться из города, где бушует эпидемия. Он голоден, истощен, а главное – ему предстоит решить, что же реально на самом деле. Lone Survivor: The Director's Cut – новый тип игры, где способ выжить зависит от вас. Это расширенное издание шедевра Джаспера Берна насыщает сюжет Lone Survivor новыми подробностями: локациями, диалогами, заданиями, предметами, а также двумя концовками, и является самой полной версией игры.

Lone Survivor: The Director's Cut really is the ultimate version of this acclaimed game.

RO.name: Lone Survivor: The Director's Cut
RO.description: In this psychological survival adventure, the masked protagonist must escape from a city ravaged by disease, by any means necessary. Starving and exhausted, he has begun to question how much of what he sees is even real. Lone Survivor: The Director's Cut is a new kind of adventure where the choice of how to survive is up to you. Sneak through without firing a single shot, or kill everything in your path. Eat and sleep well, or resort to drugs to keep going. Search for survivors, or try to escape the city alone. Look after your mental health, or descend into madness. Lone Survivor is a game where your choices genuinely matter. This extended edition of Jasper Byrne's horror masterpiece expands Lone Survivor's deep story with hundreds of tiny new details, more locations, more dialogue, more side quests, more craftable items, and even two completely new endings. Lone Survivor: The Director's Cut really is the ultimate version of this acclaimed game.
